description: Dr. Treat is a tech enabled modern veterinary care company offering virtual and in-clinic services to pet parents. We are building the largest pet health company powered by technology and driven by data to offer highly personalized & preventative care for every pet.

Welcome to Dr. Treat
# PersonalizedVeterinary Care
Get care all year round or get treated right when you need it.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/63e5455d6146062bd7ba0070_IMAGE.webp)
[Best ValueDr. Treat One™$12.42/monthbilled $149 annually• No exam fees, ever• Members get unlimited access to all clinics • Same/next day urgent care appointments](https://www.drtreat.com/<https:/app.drtreat.com/signup?plan=one>)[NewPAYG$85/visitpay per visit• Personalized, comprehensive care• Easy online booking• Continuity of care](https://www.drtreat.com/<https:/app.drtreat.com/signup?plan=payg>)
Secure Your Pet’s Spot! Appointments Open From Tomorrow.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/6384ff1b89ca3852458106a9_icons8-calendar_plus.svg)BOOK NOW](https://www.drtreat.com/</sign-up>)
Dr. Treat is a veterinary practice truly designed around your pet’s needs. We work like a clinic, but offer so much more. Your Dr. Treat One™ membership gives you access to primary, urgent care, and everything in between. Our Pet Relations team is there for you and your furry companion to provide concierge care.

What members are saying about us
## Reliable. Holistic. Fantastic.
Hear what other members have to say about our service-led and tech-centric personalized veterinary care.
###### Maggie, Dubu’s mom
Ever since we signed up, the differences are drastic. Dubu actually LOVES going to the vet now and is always trying to drag us back to Dr. Treat on his walks. Plus, I know I have reliable medical support for Dubu and I feel like a much better paw-rent.
###### Christine, Huggy’s mom
Dr. Treat is the ultimate veterinary service in San Francisco. Excellent holistic approach to the long term health and care of my pet. Great ambience, absolute comfort for the owner and pet. Every detail of care and service is addressed with imagination and a goal of perfection .
###### Aneri, Lyra’s mom
The lead veterinarian was fantastic. She spent an incredible amount of time and answered all of our questions and we came up with a treatment plan for our doggo. She answered a lot of questions and concerns our older vet wasn't able to answer effectively.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/630d17d774b709d0a3db2d95_environment01.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/630d17d7fb092a1efa2b6545_Culture%20Dr%20Treat%20Felicity%20holding%20a%20pup.webp)![State of the heart Facility with radiology, onsite pharmacy and ultrasound](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/630d17d7f5fa615a4c81dbfe_Reception%20desk%20Dr.%20Treat.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/630d17d72115da46c1f0a09b_Vets%20at%20work%20Dr.%20Treat.webp)
![Membership benefits](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/63e3c984ccf5a012f50fa0ac_Tal%20to%20Melissa.webp)
Dr. Treat One™ in 15 mins
## Talk to Melissa
Health is not one-size-fits-all. That's why we tailor a Comprehensive Program to suit your pet's unique needs. Speak with Pet Relations Director, Melissa to see if Dr. Treat One™ Membership is right for your companion.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/6384ff1b89ca3852458106a9_icons8-calendar_plus.svg)Pick a convenient time](https://www.drtreat.com/<https:/calendly.com/melissa-978/15min?month=2022-11>)
A treat for members
## Brilliant people.Amazing animals.Unique opportunities.Incredible progress. Unforgettable experiences.
Our mission is to help pets live their healthiest happiest, and longest lives by using technology and data in a way that’s never been done before. We are building the best-in-class veterinary clinics by rethinking processes, workflows, and technology that will make the lives of pets, pet parents, and vets better.
[↗ Learn about our culture](https://www.drtreat.com/</career>)
![Membership benefits](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/648a01125b7e5bc029189a4d_Life%20at%20Dr.%20Treat_.webp)
Our Vets
### World-class providers. A care team centered around your pets needs.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/6569367f3299cf6cb39de98a_Dr.%20Felicity%20Moffatt.webp)**Dr. Felicity Moffatt** Head of Veterinary Medicine](https://www.drtreat.com/<https:/www.drtreat.com/post/hot-seat-with-dr-felicity-moffatt>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/656937245722965dd0c6e937_Dr.%20Lilliam%20Alfaro.webp)**Dr. Lilliam Alfaro** Lead Veterinarian](https://www.drtreat.com/<https:/www.drtreat.com/vets/dr-lilliam-alfaro>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/6529fa79b52b8f9549608fc1_Dr.%20Tony%20Huynh.webp)**Dr. Tony Huynh** Senior Veterinarian](https://www.drtreat.com/<https:/www.drtreat.com/post/on-the-hot-seat-with-dr-tony-huynh>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/6529fa836af926707ac95da2_Dr.%20Alex%20Lee.webp)**Dr. Alex Lee** Veterinarian](https://www.drtreat.com/<https:/www.drtreat.com/post/on-the-hot-seat-with-alex-lee-dvm>)
About us
### Personalizing Veterinary Care
We wanted a future where care is data-driven, and highly personalized based on genetic predispositions.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/62301de27de5130588b2c416_arrow_forward_black_24dp.svg)Our story](https://www.drtreat.com/</about>)
![Personalizing Veterinary Care —\xa0About us](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/632362524335b8a17643ca19_aboutus%20-%20Dr.%20Treat.webp)
The treatise
### Everything you need to know on pet care
Browse latest tips, articles, interviews and more on our blog - The Treatise. Written and medically reviewed by the Dr. Treat team.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/62301de27de5130588b2c416_arrow_forward_black_24dp.svg)read our Blog](https://www.drtreat.com/</the-treatise>)
![Dr Treat Virtual App](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/6323625254c80582ac938202_The%20Treatise%20-%20Dr.%20Treat.webp)
### Want to stay updated?
If you’re interested in learning more or you’d like to read our in depth pet health & wellness guides, join our newsletter.

redefining companion care

for emergency hospital visits

for rechecks and diagnostic results

![Testimonial videos of Dr Treat⟨48⟩]
What members are saying about us
## Reliable. Holistic. Fantastic.
Hear what other members have to say about our service-led and tech-centric personalized veterinary care.
###### Maggie, Dubu’s mom
Ever since we signed up, the differences are drastic. Dubu actually LOVES going to the vet now and is always trying to drag us back to Dr. Treat on his walks. Plus, I know I have reliable medical support for Dubu and I feel like a much better paw-rent.
###### Christine, Huggy’s mom
Dr. Treat is the ultimate veterinary service in San Francisco. Excellent holistic approach to the long term health and care of my pet. Great ambience, absolute comfort for the owner and pet. Every detail of care and service is addressed with imagination and a goal of perfection .
###### Aneri, Lyra’s mom
The lead veterinarian was fantastic. She spent an incredible amount of time and answered all of our questions and we came up with a treatment plan for our doggo. She answered a lot of questions and concerns our older vet wasn't able to answer effectively.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/630d17d774b709d0a3db2d95_environment01.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/630d17d7fb092a1efa2b6545_Culture%20Dr%20Treat%20Felicity%20holding%20a%20pup.webp)![State of the heart Facility with radiology, onsite pharmacy and ultrasound⟨49⟩]![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62301de17de5130ad1b2c30b/630d17d72115da46c1f0a09b_Vets%20at%20work%20Dr.%20Treat.webp)
![Membership benefits⟨50⟩]
Dr. Treat One™ in 15 mins
## Talk to Melissa
Health is not one-size-fits-all. That's why we tailor a Comprehensive Program to suit your pet's unique needs. Speak with Pet Relations Director, Melissa to see if Dr. Treat One™ Membership is right for your companion.
![⟨27⟩Pick a convenient time](https://www.drtreat.com/<https:/calendly.com/melissa-978/15min?month=2022-11>)

## Brilliant people.Amazing animals.Unique opportunities.Incredible progress. Unforgettable experiences.
Our mission is to help pets live their healthiest happiest, and longest lives by using technology and data in a way that’s never been done before. We are building the best-in-class veterinary clinics by rethinking processes, workflows, and technology that will make the lives of pets, pet parents, and vets better.

generated_description:
### Dr. Treat: Pioneering Veterinary Care for Pets

Founded in 2021 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S22, **Dr. Treat** is reshaping the landscape of veterinary services with a tech-forward approach that aims to be "One Medical for pets." Based in San Francisco, this company offers a range of virtual and in-clinic services designed to provide comprehensive, personalized care tailored to the unique needs of pets.

#### Mission and Vision
At its core, Dr. Treat is focused on building the largest pet health company that leverages data and technology for highly personalized and preventative care. They advocate for a future where veterinary care is not only accessible but also tailored to the genetic predispositions and health requirements of individual pets.

#### Services Offered
Dr. Treat combines traditional veterinary care with modern technological solutions, including:
- **Preventive Care:** Focused on maintaining long-term health.
- **Primary Care:** Essential routine check-ups and treatments.
- **Surgical & Dental Services:** High-quality interventions when necessary.
- **Diagnostics:** In-house lab work, including x-rays and ultrasounds.
- **Virtual Care:** Remote consultations for convenience and immediate assistance.
- **Urgent Care:** Quick access to needed services, often on the same or next day.

Their unique offerings, such as the **Dr. Treat One™ membership**, start at just $12.42 a month, providing members with unlimited access to clinics and no exam fees, underscoring the commitment to both care and cost transparency.

#### Team Dynamics
Dr. Treat employs a dedicated team of 21 professionals, ensuring that the delivery of care is as considerate and thorough as possible. They emphasize a concierge-style service approach where a devoted *Pet Relations team* works closely with pet owners to navigate care options.

#### Community Focus
Dr. Treat actively encourages involvement in community health through initiatives like “Pay It Forward,” reinforcing their commitment to making pet care accessible to all. They’re also creating informative content through their blog, *The Treatise*, aimed at educating pet owners on best practices in pet care.

#### Conclusion
In a world where veterinary services often lag behind technological advancements, Dr. Treat stands out as a progressive force striving to redefine the pet care experience. With their blend of personalized care, technological integration, and a strong community sense, they're not just another vet clinic; they're a forward-thinking partner in the journey of pet ownership. If you're looking to elevate your pet's health care experience, Dr. Treat is ready to help you every step of the way.

For more information, visit their website at [Dr. Treat](https://www.drtreat.com/).
